mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PRODUCT_MID_PLM ( ID, PROD_NO, PROD_NAME, MID_PROD_NO, MID_PROD_NAME, PARENT_NO, NORMS, PARAM, MODEL_DESC, UNIT, AMOUNT, STORE_ID, ROCK_POSITION, FACTORY_ID, SOURCE, REMARK, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, HIERARCHY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midProdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{norms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rockPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hierarchy,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_PRODUCT_MID_PLM.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE PRODUCT_MID_PLM
PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_NAME = #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MID_PROD_NO = #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MID_PROD_NAME = #{midProdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_NO = #{parentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NORMS = #{norms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAM = #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL_DESC = #{modelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ROCK_POSITION = #{rockPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACTORY_ID = #{factoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIERARCHY = #{hierarchy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: SELECT ID id, PROD_NO prodNo, PROD_NAME prodName, MID_PROD_NO midProdNo, MID_PROD_NAME midProdName, PARENT_NO parentNo, NORMS norms, PARAM param, MODEL_DESC modelDesc, UNIT unit, AMOUNT amount, STORE_ID storeId, ROCK_POSITION rockPosition, FACTORY_ID factoryId, SOURCE source, REMARK remark, DELETED deleted, COMPANY_ID companyId, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, MODIFY_BY modifyBy, CREATE_TIME createTime, CREATE_BY createBy, HIERARCHY hierarchy

FROM PRODUCT_MID_PLM
order by ID desc
FROM PRODUCT_MID_PLM WHERE DELETED = "F" AND store_id is null
